definition: to swap places/to exchange roles
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: I disdained the situation with regard emperors swap .
sentences.chinese: 我不屑把处境跟帝王对调。

sentences.english: Middle age is when broadness of mind and narrowness of waist change places.
sentences.chinese: 人到中年就是思想的宽度和腰围的纤度对调。

sentences.english: However, I wouldn't change even one thing about Milan.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我不想米兰和尤文对调，一件事也不想。

sentences.english: The spaces swap over each generation.
sentences.chinese: 这些空间按每次生成对调。

sentences.english: This time, the roles have been exchanged only .
sentences.chinese: 只是，这一次，大家的角色对调了。

sentences.english: The suitability of profile control and water plugging is evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 并对调剖堵水等工艺措施的适应性进行了评价。

sentences.english: On the base of these, we studied the effect of chelator on the stability of acidic juice-milk.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，研究螯合剂对调酸果奶稳定性的影响。
